name: mechouia salad
ingredients: Black olives and hard-boiled eggs (for garnish, optional)
steps: Wash the bell peppers, tomatoes, onions, and chili peppers. Grill them whole in the oven (230Â°C for 20-30 minutes) or on a barbecue until the skin is blackened and blistered.
Remove the vegetables and cover them (with a plastic bag or a damp cloth) for a few minutes to make peeling easier.
Peel the bell peppers, tomatoes, onions, and chili peppers. Remove the seeds from the bell peppers and chili peppers.
Finely chop the grilled vegetables and garlic (traditionally with a knife or a food processor for a smooth texture).
In a large bowl, mix the chopped vegetables with olive oil, lemon juice, caraway, coriander, salt, and pepper.
Taste and adjust the seasoning. Serve cold or warm, garnished with black olives and hard-boiled eggs (or tuna).
